attributes.action: If ur pet need anaesthetic, be in op room so u know the meds/treatments given
attributes.additional_details: My dog was nearly given 2 lots of sedation. My dog went into the operating room with her heart and organs all in perfect condition as tests had shown. They were mistakes made before she went in & I believe mistake was made while she was in the operating room. Mainly she was put to sleep without my concent. So if you can stomach been there with your pet or even behind a glass panel, I think we should be aloud then at least we will know what treatment and medication is given to our pets
attributes.background:
At the beginning of this year I took my dog to the Vets (Pdsa).Had a very bad experience with 1 of the vets as he was saying Quote : I won't operate unless I put your dog to sleep after. Quote : your dog will pop her clogs in afew weeks anyway.
Rest in peace baby girl, never 4get u n always lov u
